entry.def: If someone is underemployed, they have not got enough work to do, or their work does not make full use of their skills or abilities.

example.ex: He was underemployed and not satisfied with his work.
example.tran: 他的才干得不到充分施展，因此他不满意自己的工作。

means.word_mean: 1. employed only part-time when one needs full-time employment or not making full use of your skills;
